page.title: 06Rockbeare Quarry 2
page.content: it in half.The people who did this were paid by however many stacks they did.The stacks had to be 2 feet tall at least.Then we looked round the quarry.We saw the canteen,labatory, gravel tip,silt pond,sand pile,concrete works,tar mixer,stone dryer,cleaner,crusher & sorter.Also we saw the lorry park,car park,weigh bridge,turning place,first aid post, office block,other car park & loading bay.Something else we saw was a hand dug quarry which is now a tip.That is about all we saw.Then we went to Mr. Wests office and asked him some more questions.The quarry is 77 years old. And if you are wondering who Mr.West is he is the manager of the quarry. It was a nice trip and very interesting.
